author: psmith
msg: default property says that it is NOT ok to remove the SecurityManager.

author: psmith
msg: * Only remove the SecurityManager if the Preferences says its ok to do so
* TEMPORARILY switch the TCCL on Chainsaw startup so that JoranConfigurator has access to the ClassLoader
that can access the JMS/DB/whatever jars/resources that are required.  Hoping this is ok for now, until a
better stategy can be thought of.

author: psmith
msg: When creating a Receiver from the GUI, it now does not use the TCCL, but uses
the PluginClassloader which is specific to Chainsaw.

author: psmith
msg: User is now required to authorise that it's ok to remove the SecurityManager.
